title: Email: Interacting With a Sent Email Campaign
body:
Email: Interacting With a Sent Email Campaign¶

Once your email campaign has been sent, you may perform the following actions.
You should have clicked when viewing the desired email campaign
Click one of the following options and follow the steps below:

  1. Convert to Template:

    • Enter the template title

    • Click Save

    • Your email campaign will now be available as a template

  2. Resend Campaign:

    • You can curate a list of recipients under To (click here for options)

    • You can also opt to Schedule Delivery instead of the default option to Send immediately:

    • Select a Date

    • Enter a Time

    • Click Resend

  3. Clone Campaign:

    • Edit the original email or leave all details identical

    • Click Save

    • Your cloned email campaign will now be available in email campaigns

  4. Delete Campaign:

    • Click Yes

    • Note that in addition to your email, all associated workflows and performance data will be deleted
